programme.title: Unwrapping Christmas: Olivia's Reunion
programme.desc: Desperate to make it back home in time for the Christmas Gala, Olivia gets snowed-in with her ex-boyfriend while delivering gifts.

programme.title: Unwrapping Christmas: Mia's Prince
programme.desc: Romance novel enthusiast Mia meets Beau, a philanthropist, who is the spitting image of her favorite book hero. As they consider exploring a new romance, Beau's mother has other ideas.

programme.title: Holiday Crashers
programme.desc: Best friends Toni and Bri have worked at the same card shop for more years than they should as both struggle to find their true life's path. Toni and Bri decide to create new identities to crash the Christmas parties.

programme.title: Christmas Next Door
programme.desc: Eric Randall, an author of bachelor lifestyle books, is left in charge of his young niece and nephew for the holidays. Unsure of himself, Eric turns to his neighbor April, a lover of all things Christmas, for help.

programme.title: Holiday Hearts
programme.desc: While planning an annual Christmas party, Peyton is forced together with Ben to care for a friend's daughter.

programme.title: The Christmas Train
programme.desc: A cynical journalist must get from Washington, D.C., to Los Angeles in time for Christmas, and his only option is to take the train.

programme.title: Christmas With Holly
programme.desc: The owner (Eloise Mumford) of a toy store falls in love with a man (Sean Faris) who cares for his orphaned niece.

programme.title: The Nine Kittens of Christmas
programme.desc: Cat lovers Zachary and Marilee are thrown back together at Christmastime when they're tasked with finding homes for a litter of adorable kittens.

programme.title: Cross Country Christmas
programme.desc: When a snowstorm disrupts both Lina's and Max's holiday plans, they realize they must work together to find a way home -- without taking it out on each other.

programme.title: Following Yonder Star
programme.desc: A former television star waits out a scandal in Vermont. She becomes close with the innkeeper and his daughter while she helps him direct the local Christmas pageant.

programme.title: A Christmas Detour
programme.desc: Two travelers become linked when a snowstorm grounds their flight in Buffalo. Paige desperately needs to find a way to New York City to meet her fiance's parents, and it's up to Dylan, a fellow passenger and a guy she can't stand, to get her there.

programme.title: Unwrapping Christmas: Olivia's Reunion
programme.desc: Desperate to make it back home in time for the Christmas Gala, Olivia gets snowed-in with her ex-boyfriend while delivering gifts.

programme.title: Holidazed
programme.desc: In the Manetti-Hanahan family, there's never a silent night at Christmastime; this year, Connie wants peace and asks her husband Chuck to put aside his neighborhood rivalry.

programme.title: Holidazed
programme.desc: After a power outage, the neighborhood families come together on Christmas Day.

programme.title: Three Wiser Men and a Boy
programme.desc: The Brenner brothers return and put on a holiday pageant for young Thomas while trying to cope with life's curveballs, including their mom's new boyfriend.

programme.title: Never Kiss a Man in a Christmas Sweater
programme.desc: A single mom faces Christmas alone until a stranger crashes into her life and becomes an unexpected houseguest.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche dates a young aerobics instructor; Rose's mother, Alma Lindstrom, teaches her an important lesson.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: The women bring their separate views of death into focus after Sophia suffers the symptoms of a heart attack.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy's ex-husband comes to town and spends the night with her.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: At a library benefit Halloween costume party, Niles arrives at conclusions about Frasier and Daphne.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: As her pregnancy progresses, Roz informs the father; Daphne gets baby-sitting help from Martin and Niles.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Deprived of Van's attention, Cheyenne develops a relationship with the father of her daughter's play date.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Finger-pointing begins when Barbra Jean's new dog goes missing and a psychic tells her someone in the family is to blame.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: When Reba enters a beauty pageant for grandmothers, Barbra Jean becomes jealous and sets out to prove she is the true Grandma Hart.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba is thrilled when the city's hottest real estate agent wants to interview her for a job, until the woman shows up unannounced for a surprise meeting.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Sophia decides to live in California with Dorothy's sister Gloria.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose tries to conceal the fact that she is dating Dr. Jonathan Newman, a little person.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Dorothy's becomes involved with a married coworker; her housemates disapprove.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Rose makes a mistake when she allows her boyfriend to spend the night with her.

programme.title: My Norwegian Holiday
programme.desc: A grieving woman forges a deep connection with a Norwegian man when he discovers she has a troll figurine from his hometown. She soon agrees to accompany him to Norway to uncover the troll's origins and find her own path to healing, love and family.

programme.title: A Dickens of a Holiday!
programme.desc: To mark the 100th anniversary of a Victorian festival, Cassie invites movie star and former high school classmate Jake to play Scrooge in "A Christmas Carol.".

programme.title: Switched for Christmas
programme.desc: At their obligatory pre-Christmas lunch, estranged identical twins decide to swap lives up until Christmas Day.

programme.title: Our Holiday Story
programme.desc: A loving couple shares the story of how they met and fell in love when their daughter's boyfriend comes to meet them for the first time at Christmas.

programme.title: Jingle Bell Run
programme.desc: Self-described bookworm Avery is paired with retired hockey star Wes to compete in a holiday race across America. The team struggles through themed challenges until romance runs its course.

programme.title: Christmas at Sea
programme.desc: On the last day of the cruise, a romantic celebration unfolds at sea with help from Hallmark Stars; Laura lands a life-changing opportunity, and passengers enjoy a final day of fun, laughter, and unforgettable holiday memories.
